name: Virtual Towers Online
description:
We are using the architectural block plans (submitted to Stafforshire Moorlands District Council for new park developments), and a huge library of photographs, to recreate the theme park on a popular 3D modelling program (Google Sketchup).
This method is allowing us to create a virtual model, which is identical in every way to the real thing, to an accuracy of +/- 0.5m. That will include, working rides, shops, games stalls, ancillary/service buildings, and all theming elements. Even the trees will be accurate to their correct species, placement, and last recorded height!
